title: XBOX360版TU12开发进度：建筑高度加倍、加入倒置台阶
author: seraph0012
txt_content:
4J Studios ‏@4JStudios

TU12版本还需要很长时间才能发布，但是这里有一个截图可以告诉你们一些关于TU12的新特性：
There's a long way to go yet with the TU12 work, but here's a screenshot showing some of the new features :) 




BLbePTGCEAA0Bqy .jpg (14.73 KB, 下载次数: 7)

下载附件

2013-6-1 07:30 上传






是的，TU12中建筑高度将会加倍
@4JMinecraftXBOX Yes, the build height will be doubled in TU12

是的，TU12中将会加入倒置的台阶
@ReecieReece25 Yes, upside down slabs will be in TU12 too.
